title: M. Tech Project
text:
M. Tech Project or Master's Thesis (also known as MTP) is a dissertation carried out by Dual Degree and Integrated M.Sc. students in their final year (5th year) and masters students towards fulfilment of necessary credits and award of final academic degree.
The project work is carried out by students over a period of an year. The total credits for the project are distributed between the two semesters.

title: Evaluation
text: The projects are evaluated by respective department committees usually by the end of semester examinations. In few cases, the evaluations are scheduled after the end-semester examinations. A guideline of presentation, including the style of report and other details vary department wise.
